external_games.name: G-MODEアーカイブス17 フライハイトクラウディア3

name: G-Mode Archives 17: Flyhight Cloudia III
storyline:
Cloudia closed the cloud hole and peace returned again.

The Zards returned to Eldia and embarked on an investigation to uncover the conspiracy of the Thesis Committee.

On the other hand, Nia, who was released from demonization, is determined to remain in the sky with Reinas and others,
Eldia's superparticle gun "Light of Arneus" was released, and the sky was cut again.

The thesis committee and the Eldia government army on an offensive with magical beasts.
Cloudia's army, including Reinas, makes a request to each country and gathers a large fleet.
What is the true purpose of the thesis committee? What is the secret hidden in Zard's birth?

All the mysteries are solved here and now.
summary: The thoughts reflected in the distant sky are the ties that bind a new world... Here and now, all the mysteries will be revealed.
